r.d: This is the MS SQL Server MDB2 driver.
r.n:
- Fixed bug #16612: Added the timestamp database attribute [genericbob] - fixed bug #16118: escape doesn't take into account trailing backslashes [urkle] - request #16903: Add ability to use ODBTP extension [hedroom] - fixed numRows() with setLimit()
open todo items: - explore fast limit/offset emulation (Request #4544)
